scripts.i: npm i && npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.watch: start npm run client & start npm run server
scripts.watch-linux: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.watch-windows: START /MIN npm run server && START /MIN npm run client
scripts.test: npm test --prefix server && npm test --prefix client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm start --prefix server
